title: RP ADDTO: Theorems requiring subset and intersection existence

blocks.name: elinintrab
blocks.content: Two ways of saying a set is an element of the intersection of a class with the intersection of a class. (Contributed by RP, 14-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm elinintrab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cint(crab(s0, cpw(c2), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cin(c2, cv(s1))), w0))))), wa(wi(wex(s1, w0), wcel(c0, c2)), wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cint(crab(s0, cpw(c2), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cin(c2, cv(s1))), w0))))), wa(wi(wex(s1, w0), wcel(c0, c2)), wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, cv(s1))))), wa(wi(wex(s1, w0), wcel(c0, c2)), wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, cin(c2, cv(s1)))))))
  elmapintrab(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, cin(c2, cv(s1)), w0)
  inex2(c2, cv(s1))
  vex(s1)
  inss1(c2, cv(s1))
  bitri(wa(wi(wex(s1, w0), wcel(c0, c2)), wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, cin(c2, cv(s1)))))), wa(wi(wex(s1, w0), wcel(c0, c2)), wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, cv(s1))))), wa(wi(wex(s1, w0), wcel(c0, c2)), wa(wi(wex(s1, w0), wcel(c0, c2)), wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  anbi2i(wi(wex(s1, w0), wcel(c0, c2)), wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, cin(c2, cv(s1))))), wa(wi(wex(s1, w0), wcel(c0, c2)), wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, cv(s1))))))
  bitri(wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, cin(c2, cv(s1))))), wa(wi(wex(s1, w0), wcel(c0, c2)), wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, cv(s1))))), wal(s1, wa(wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2)), wi(w0, wcel(c0, cv(s1))))))
  albii(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, cin(c2, cv(s1)))), wa(wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2)), wi(w0, wcel(c0, cv(s1)))))
  bitri(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cin(c2, cv(s1)))), wa(wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2)), wi(w0, wcel(c0, cv(s1)))), wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, cv(s1)))))
  imbi2i(w0, wcel(c0, cin(c2, cv(s1))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, cv(s1))))
  elin(c0, c2, cv(s1))
  jcab(w0, wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, cv(s1)))
  bitri(wal(s1, wa(wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2)), wi(w0, wcel(c0, cv(s1))))), wa(wi(wex(s1, w0), wcel(c0, c2)), wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, cv(s1))))), wa(wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))), wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, cv(s1))))))
  19.26(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2)), wi(w0, wcel(c0, cv(s1))))
  anbi1i(wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))), wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, cv(s1)))), wi(wex(s1, w0), wcel(c0, c2)))
  19.23v(s1, w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  anabs5(wi(wex(s1, w0), wcel(c0, c2)), wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(c0, cv(s1)))))
  diff.cin.s(s0, c2, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elinintrab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ c1 â†’(c0 âˆˆ â‹‚ { s0 âˆˆ P(c2)| âˆƒ(s1,(s0 =(c2 â‹‚ s1)âˆ§ w0))} â†”((âˆƒ(s1, w0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2)âˆ§ âˆ€(s1,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ s1)))))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl6bb(c0 âˆˆ c1, c0 âˆˆ â‹‚ { s0 âˆˆ P(c2)| âˆƒ(s1,(s0 =(c2 â‹‚ s1)âˆ§ w0))}, ((âˆƒ(s1, w0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2)âˆ§ âˆ€(s1,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ s1))), ((âˆƒ(s1, w0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2)âˆ§ âˆ€(s1,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ(c2 â‹‚ s1)))))
  elmapintrab(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, (c2 â‹‚ s1), w0)
  inex2(c2, s1)
  vex(s1)
  inss1(c2, s1)
  bitri(((âˆƒ(s1, w0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2)âˆ§ âˆ€(s1,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ(c2 â‹‚ s1)))), ((âˆƒ(s1, w0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2)âˆ§ âˆ€(s1,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ s1))), ((âˆƒ(s1, w0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2)âˆ§((âˆƒ(s1, w0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2)âˆ§ âˆ€(s1,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ s1)))))
  anbi2i((âˆƒ(s1, w0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2), âˆ€(s1,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ(c2 â‹‚ s1))), ((âˆƒ(s1, w0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2)âˆ§ âˆ€(s1,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ s1))))
  bitri(âˆ€(s1,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ(c2 â‹‚ s1))), ((âˆƒ(s1, w0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2)âˆ§ âˆ€(s1,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ s1))), âˆ€(s1,((w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2)âˆ§(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ s1))))
  albii(s1, (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ(c2 â‹‚ s1)), ((w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2)âˆ§(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ s1)))
  bitri((w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ(c2 â‹‚ s1)), ((w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2)âˆ§(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ s1)), (w0 â†’(c0 âˆˆ c2 âˆ§ c0 âˆˆ s1)))
  imbi2i(w0, c0 âˆˆ(c2 â‹‚ s1), (c0 âˆˆ c2 âˆ§ c0 âˆˆ s1))
  elin(c0, c2, s1)
  jcab(w0, c0 âˆˆ c2, c0 âˆˆ s1)
  bitri(âˆ€(s1,((w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2)âˆ§(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ s1))), ((âˆƒ(s1, w0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2)âˆ§ âˆ€(s1,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ s1))), (âˆ€(s1,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2))âˆ§ âˆ€(s1,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ s1))))
  19.26(s1, (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2), (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ s1))
  anbi1i(âˆ€(s1,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2)), âˆ€(s1,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ s1)), (âˆƒ(s1, w0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2))
  19.23v(s1, w0, c0 âˆˆ c2)
  anabs5((âˆƒ(s1, w0)â†’ c0 âˆˆ c2), âˆ€(s1,(w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ s1)))
  diff.cin.s(s0, c2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: inintabss
blocks.content: Upper bound on intersection of class and the intersection of a class. (Contributed by RP, 13-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm inintabss(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wss(cin(c0, cint(cab(s0, w0))), cint(crab(s1, cpw(c0), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cin(c0, cv(s0))), w0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, cin(c0, cint(cab(s0, w0))), cint(crab(s1, cpw(c0), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cin(c0, cv(s0))), w0)))))
  3imtr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, cint(cab(s0, w0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(crab(s1, cpw(c0), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cin(c0, cv(s0))), w0))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s0, wi(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wa(wi(wex(s0, w0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wal(s0, wi(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  anim1i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s0, wi(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wi(wex(s0, w0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ax-1(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wex(s0, w0))
  elinintab(s0, cv(hs0), c0, w0)
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cint(crab(s1, cpw(c0), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cin(c0, cv(s0))), w0))))), wa(wi(wex(s0, w0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wal(s0, wi(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  elinintrab(s1, s0, cv(hs0), universe, c0, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c0, cint(cab(s0, w0))))
  diff.hs0.c(cint(crab(s1, cpw(c0), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cin(c0, cv(s0))), w0)))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm inintabss(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 â‹‚ â‹‚ { s0 | w0 })âŠ† â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P(c0)| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 =(c0 â‹‚ s0)âˆ§ w0))}
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, (c0 â‹‚ â‹‚ { s0 | w0 }), â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P(c0)| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 =(c0 â‹‚ s0)âˆ§ w0))})
  3imtr4i(hs0 âˆˆ(c0 â‹‚ â‹‚ { s0 | w0 }), hs0 âˆˆ â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P(c0)| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 =(c0 â‹‚ s0)âˆ§ w0))}, (hs0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0,(w0 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s0))), ((âˆƒ(s0, w0)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ c0)âˆ§ âˆ€(s0,(w0 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s0))))
  anim1i(hs0 âˆˆ c0, âˆ€(s0,(w0 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s0)), (âˆƒ(s0, w0)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ c0))
  ax-1(hs0 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(s0, w0))
  elinintab(s0, hs0, c0, w0)
  ax-mp((hs0 âˆˆ â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P(c0)| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 =(c0 â‹‚ s0)âˆ§ w0))} â†”((âˆƒ(s0, w0)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ c0)âˆ§ âˆ€(s0,(w0 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s0)))), hs0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  vex(hs0)
  elinintrab(s1, s0, hs0, universe, c0, w0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 â‹‚ â‹‚ { s0 | w0 }))
  diff.hs0.c(â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P(c0)| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 =(c0 â‹‚ s0)âˆ§ w0))})
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: inintabd
blocks.content: Value of the intersection of class with the intersection of a nonempty class. (Contributed by RP, 13-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm inintabd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cin(c0, cint(cab(s0, w1))), cint(crab(s1, cpw(c0), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cin(c0, cv(s0))), w1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cin(c0, cint(cab(s0, w1))), cint(crab(s1, cpw(c0), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cin(c0, cv(s0))), w1)))), w0)
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, cint(cab(s0, w1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(crab(s1, cpw(c0), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cin(c0, cv(s0))), w1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wa(wi(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  anbi1d(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wi(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  bicomd(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  syl(w0, wb(wi(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wex(s0, w1))
  pm5.5(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  elinintab(s0, cv(hs0), c0, w1)
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cint(crab(s1, cpw(c0), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cin(c0, cv(s0))), w1))))), wa(wi(wex(s0, w1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  elinintrab(s1, s0, cv(hs0), universe, c0, w1)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c0, cint(cab(s0, w1))))
  diff.hs0.c(cint(crab(s1, cpw(c0), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cin(c0, cv(s0))), w1)))))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm inintabd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’(c0 â‹‚ â‹‚ { s0 | w1 })= â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P(c0)| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 =(c0 â‹‚ s0)âˆ§ w1))})
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ âˆƒ(s0, w1))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (c0 â‹‚ â‹‚ { s0 | w1 }), â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P(c0)| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 =(c0 â‹‚ s0)âˆ§ w1))}, w0)
  3bitr4g(w0, hs0 âˆˆ(c0 â‹‚ â‹‚ { s0 | w1 }), hs0 âˆˆ â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P(c0)| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 =(c0 â‹‚ s0)âˆ§ w1))}, (hs0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0,(w1 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s0))), ((âˆƒ(s0, w1)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ c0)âˆ§ âˆ€(s0,(w1 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s0))))
  anbi1d(w0, hs0 âˆˆ c0, âˆ€(s0,(w1 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s0)), (âˆƒ(s0, w1)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ c0))
  bicomd(w0, hs0 âˆˆ c0, (âˆƒ(s0, w1)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ c0))
  syl(w0, ((âˆƒ(s0, w1)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ c0)â†” hs0 âˆˆ c0), âˆƒ(s0, w1))
  pm5.5(âˆƒ(s0, w1), hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  elinintab(s0, hs0, c0, w1)
  ax-mp((hs0 âˆˆ â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P(c0)| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 =(c0 â‹‚ s0)âˆ§ w1))} â†”((âˆƒ(s0, w1)â†’ hs0 âˆˆ c0)âˆ§ âˆ€(s0,(w1 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s0)))), hs0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  vex(hs0)
  elinintrab(s1, s0, hs0, universe, c0, w1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 â‹‚ â‹‚ { s0 | w1 }))
  diff.hs0.c(â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P(c0)| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 =(c0 â‹‚ s0)âˆ§ w1))})
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
